game.name: The Black Guards of Odom - Desert Town Prison
game.shortDescription: You just joined the guards in Odom, a border town full of merchants, travelers, and shady individuals. Soon enough, you'll start climbing the ranks and getting the many perks of a successful career. How far will your ambitions take you?
